header.title: Frontend Engineer / Full-Stack Developer
header.greeting: Hi, I'm Febe. I'm a frontend-focused engineer who builds interactive web experiences. I specialize in Vue.js and Nuxt, focusing on clean architecture and performance optimization.

sections.technical_skills_desc: A focused set of technologies I work with daily
sections.get_in_touch_desc: Feel free to reach out through any of these channels

skills.frontend_desc: Proficient in building dynamic, responsive user interfaces and seamless user experiences.
skills.backend_desc: Experienced in building the data layers required by various applications and connecting them to the frontend.

experience.desc_1: Refactored existing native HTML sites to Vue 2 architecture, responsible for component modularization, data binding, and deployment.
experience.desc_2: Developed frontend using Vue.js and SCSS, and assisted backend development with API integration.

projects.project_1_desc: Personal travel content website, featuring RWD design. Built with Vue3, Nuxt, Tailwind, and GSAP. Responsible for UI design, frontend slicing, and documentation.
projects.project_2_desc: Real-time garbage reporting and response application (Mobile first). Used Vue2, Ant Design, Node.js, and MongoDB. Integrated Google Map API for garbage collection route planning. Developed custom backend API for server-side logic.

about.title: Junior Frontend Engineer
about.school: National Taichung University of Science and Technology ï½œ Graduated:  2020
about.des: I am a junior frontend engineer specializing in Vue and Nuxt, with experience in building responsive websites, animation effects, and integrating APIs. I enjoy transforming design into real, interactive products and continuously improving UI performance and user experience. I also have basic backend experience with Node.js and MongoDB, which helps me better collaborate in full-stack projects.
